      • getRadialDistortCoeff

        public double[] getRadialDistortCoeff()
        Returns:
        the radialDistortion

      • useR2R4

        public boolean useR2R4()
        Returns:
        true if using radial distortion function from Ma et al. 2004 for model #4 in Table 2, f(r) = 1 +k1*r^2 + k2*r^4, else return false if using model #3 f(r) = 1 +k1*r + k2*r^2.

      • setRadialDistortion

        public void setRadialDistortion(double[] radialDistortion,
                                boolean useR2R4)
        Parameters:
        radialDistortion - the radialDistortion to set
        useR2R4 - use radial distortion function from Ma et al. 2004 for model #4 in Table 2, f(r) = 1 +k1*r^2 + k2*r^4 if true, else use model #3 f(r) = 1 +k1*r + k2*r^2.

      • getIntrinsics
